SEARCH

Class Branch

java.lang.Object
Branch
public class Branch extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Branch(int branchCode)
    Object constructor that takes in a specific id which is the branch code and read each specific data in the file Helps in displaying the values of each attribute that a branch has and segregate them by their branch code useful for viewBranches() only It reads Branch.csv as the data contains branch code, branch name, branch reserve, opening and closing hours for loop is used for assigning the attributes into an array and then displaying them as a full list of branches

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    checkAvailability()
    checkAvailability retrieves the opening and closing hours of the branch and assign it to the variables, open and close it calls for the current time with the use of LocalTime an if statement is created to check if the current time is after closing time or before opening time if they are then, it will display a message to come again tomorrow if not then it will tell the user that the branch is currently open
    void
    depositReserve(double amount)
    Method depositReserve is when the user deposits money through their bank account, the money would go to the branch's reserves
    int
    getBranchCode()
    Getter and Setter methods for the attributes of the branch class getBranchCode returns the branch code
    String
    getBranchName()
    getBranchName returns the branch's name
    double
    getBranchReserve()
    getBranchReserve returns the branch's reserve
    LocalTime
    getClosingHours()
    getClosingHours returns the branch's closing hours in LocalTime format
    LocalTime
    getOpeninghours()
    getOpeningHours returns the branch's opening hours in LocalTime format
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    Main class is used for testing of the branch class Can be used by initiating a new branch object then call out its specific functions to see if they work
    void
    printBranchDetails()
    Method printBranchDetails is used to print the specific set of information of branch code, branch name, branch reserve and their opening/closing Hours
    void
    setBranchCode(int branchCode)
    setBranchCode allows the branch code to be changed accordingly
    void
    setBranchName(String branchName)
    setBranchName can change the name of the branch based on user
    void
    setBranchReserve(double branchReserve)
    setBranchReserve allows a user to manually set how much a bank has
    void
    setClosingHours(LocalTime closingHours)
    setClosingHours can change the closing hours of a branch
    void
    setOpeningHours(LocalTime openingHours)
    setOpeningHours can change the opening hours of a branch
    void
    viewBranches()
    Function to view the list of branches by looping through the array that has been instantised It will display every branch detail according to the branch code
    void
    withdrawReserve(double amount)
    Method withdrawReserve is when the user withdraws money from their bank account from a specific branch, and the money from the branch's reserve would be deducted

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Branch

      public Branch(int branchCode)
      Object constructor that takes in a specific id which is the branch code and read each specific data in the file Helps in displaying the values of each attribute that a branch has and segregate them by their branch code useful for viewBranches() only It reads Branch.csv as the data contains branch code, branch name, branch reserve, opening and closing hours for loop is used for assigning the attributes into an array and then displaying them as a full list of branches

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main class is used for testing of the branch class Can be used by initiating a new branch object then call out its specific functions to see if they work

    • viewBranches

      public void viewBranches()
      Function to view the list of branches by looping through the array that has been instantised It will display every branch detail according to the branch code

    • checkAvailability

      public void checkAvailability()
      checkAvailability retrieves the opening and closing hours of the branch and assign it to the variables, open and close it calls for the current time with the use of LocalTime an if statement is created to check if the current time is after closing time or before opening time if they are then, it will display a message to come again tomorrow if not then it will tell the user that the branch is currently open

    • getBranchCode

      public int getBranchCode()
      Getter and Setter methods for the attributes of the branch class getBranchCode returns the branch code

    • getBranchReserve

      public double getBranchReserve()
      getBranchReserve returns the branch's reserve

    • getBranchName

      public String getBranchName()
      getBranchName returns the branch's name

    • getOpeninghours

      public LocalTime getOpeninghours()
      getOpeningHours returns the branch's opening hours in LocalTime format

    • getClosingHours

      public LocalTime getClosingHours()
      getClosingHours returns the branch's closing hours in LocalTime format

    • setBranchCode

      public void setBranchCode(int branchCode)
      setBranchCode allows the branch code to be changed accordingly
      Parameters:
      branchCode - value to change the branch code

    • setBranchName

      public void setBranchName(String branchName)
      setBranchName can change the name of the branch based on user
      Parameters:
      branchName - value to change the branch name

    • setBranchReserve

      public void setBranchReserve(double branchReserve)
      setBranchReserve allows a user to manually set how much a bank has
      Parameters:
      branchReserve - value to change the reserve of a branch

    • setOpeningHours

      public void setOpeningHours(LocalTime openingHours)
      setOpeningHours can change the opening hours of a branch
      Parameters:
      openingHours - value to change the opening hours of a branch

    • setClosingHours

      public void setClosingHours(LocalTime closingHours)
      setClosingHours can change the closing hours of a branch
      Parameters:
      closingHours - value to change the closing hours of a branch

    • withdrawReserve

      public void withdrawReserve(double amount)
      Method withdrawReserve is when the user withdraws money from their bank account from a specific branch, and the money from the branch's reserve would be deducted
      Parameters:
      amount - is used when an amount is entered for the user to withdraw from their acc With this amount it reduces the specific branch's reserve

    • depositReserve

      public void depositReserve(double amount)
      Method depositReserve is when the user deposits money through their bank account, the money would go to the branch's reserves
      Parameters:
      amount - is used when an amount is entered for the user to deposit into their acc With this amount, it increases the branch's reserve as well

    • printBranchDetails

      public void printBranchDetails()
      Method printBranchDetails is used to print the specific set of information of branch code, branch name, branch reserve and their opening/closing Hours
